name: Number of Developer
desc: We want to have a public record of the total number of Developers, we have in Ajegunle. This will help us plan for numerious Opportunities for Developers

name: Clutter Area
desc: We sub divid Ajegunle in five(5) communities, namely: Boundary, Orige, Ojo Road, Tolu and Wilma, we want to know which area has the most Developers.

name: Available stacks
desc: There are a lot of Job that are constantly in coming up and it such need the service of a Developer. We want to know how to evenly distribute these JOBS!
